title: Left 4 dead 2 + PlayBCM servers ip
description:
Year of release / build: 2009/2014
Genres: Action (Shooter), cooperative game
Developer: Valve Corporation, Electronic Arts
Version: 2.1.3.7 (from 24/11/14)
Language: Only Russian
Tablet: enclosing

Left 4 Dead 2 - Co-operative shooter with elements of survival horror. You have to fight with a huge number of firearms and melee weapons with hordes of zombies and special infected. In this you will help other live players with whom you have to go through a lot of different places. Assembling BCM - this modification adds a 60 custom campaigns that multiply the number of nights slaughter gameplay for new players, and give a reason to return to your favorite game in a new guise seasoned players.

System requirements:
Operating System: Windows XP / Vista / 7/8;
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or better;
Video card: NVIDIA GeForce 8600GT or better;
Hard Drive: 38.9 GB of free space;
RAM: 2 GB;

Install:
Mount the downloaded .iso file using Daemon Tools or other similar programs.
Run setup.exe from the mounted image and stick to the installation wizard.
After installation, you will be able to run the game with the appropriate shortcut on the desktop
